mean_en: having passed the exams or completed the training that are necessary in order to do a particular job; having the experience to do a particular job
sentence: Admission letters indicate students are qualified for their dream university.
sentence_trans: 录取通知书表明学生有资格进入他们梦想的大学。
word_etyma: qualif\u003dqualify资格 + ied形容词后缀 → qualified有资格的
